tool_description: Checks photographer availability and returns open time slots for portrait sessions within specified date ranges and duration requirements.

start_date.description: Earliest acceptable session date in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: Latest acceptable session date in ISO 8601 format

session_duration_hours.description: Required session duration in hours (0.5 to 8.0)

preferred_times.description: Preferred time slots: morning, afternoon, evening, golden_hour

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be future dates.
Invalid session duration: Duration must be between 0.5 and 8.0 hours.
Invalid time preference: Use one or more of [morning, afternoon, evening, golden_hour].
No availability found: No open slots match the specified criteria.
usage: Provide start_date, end_date, and session_duration_hours to find available appointment slots. Optionally specify preferred_times to filter results.

available_slots.description: List of available appointment times in ISO 8601 format

total_slots_found.description: Number of available time slots found

next_available.description: Earliest available appointment time in ISO 8601 format
